mapper.select: SELECT post_num, post_title, post_filePath, post_content, post_regr_id, post_reg_dtime, post_disp_tf, post_proj_num FROM proj_post_board WHERE post_proj_num=#{num} ORDER BY post_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proj_post_board (post_num, post_title, post_filePath, post_content, post_regr_id, post_modr_id, post_proj_num) VALUES(#{post_num}, #{post_title},#{post_filePath},#{post_content}, #{post_regr_id}, #{post_modr_id}, #{post_proj_num})
